title: Xiaohongshu Data Retrieval

alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve data like title, likes count, etc., based on Xiaohongshu article link
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. If mapping is needed, please ensure the field names in the multi-dimensional table are consistent with the option names. It is recommended that the 'Blogger' field type be text, 'xx Count' field types be numeric, and 'xx Time' fields be date. The 'Total Interaction Count' field can be calculated from multiple fields.

checks.number: Type Check Failed: Type is not a number
checks.text: Type Check Failed: Type is not text
checks.datetime: Type Check Failed: Type is not a date
checks.attachment: Type Check Failed: Type is not an attachment

placeholder.link: Please select the field column corresponding to the video link
placeholder.interCount: Please select all fields that need to be calculated
placeholder.cookie: Please input the cookie as per the instruction manual
placeholder.xSCommon: Please input X-S-Common as per the instruction manual
